129.237.1.1|the ip address of this computer|thisip
129.237.201.233|the ip address of the Mac computer used for releases|macip
specify|the username to log into the remote machine with|username
winlin|the base string for Windows and Linux Install4j project files|winlinbase
mac|the base string for Mac Install4j project files|macbase
../web_launch|the relative path to the web launch directory on the local machine|intdirlocal
../web_launch_ext|the relative path to the external web launch directory on the local machine|extdirlocal
web_launch|the relative path to the web launch directory on the Mac machine|intdirmac
web_launch_ext|the relative path to the external web launch directory on the Mac machine|extdirmac
../workspace/SpTrunk/packaging|the relative path to the trunk projects on the local machine|trunkdirlocal
Documents/workspace/Specify6/packaging|the relative path to the trunk projects on the Mac machine|trunkdirmac
../workspace/Specify_7732/packaging|the relative path to the branch projects on the local machine|branchdirlocal
Documents/workspace/SpBranch/packaging|the relative path to the branch projects on the Mac machine|branchdirmac
specify6-test.nhm.ku.edu|the value (with no http prefix) of the internal update server|intserver
specifysoftware.org|the value (with no http prefix) of the production server|extserver
../install4j/bin|the relative path from configure_environment.sh to the local install4j bin folder|i4jlocal
/Applications/install4j/bin|the absolute path to the remote install4j bin folder on the mac|i4jmac
../Install4JUpdater/bin|the relative path from this script up to and including the bin directory of the Install4j updater application|i4jU
//huxley/specify6/SpecifyAlphaInstallers|the absolute path of the backup folder on the backup server|backupserver
